salaryExpectations: LKR 75,000 (Coordinator) to LKR 300,000+ (Project Manager) per month.
futureOutlook: The role of a Project Coordinator is the classic entry point into the field of Project Management. Every industry, from IT to construction to NGOs, needs people to keep projects organized and on track. It is a versatile role with a clear and structured career path towards becoming a certified Project Manager (PMP).
